name: French | West | Vaughan
tagline: Quite simply, we love what we do.
description:
Welcome to French/West/Vaughan. We also answer to National Consumer Agency of the Year, Brandweek’s National Marketer of the Year and the World’s Fastest Growing PR Agency.
What earned us these distinctions and more? Is it our variety of communication tools that include public relations, public affairs, e-Merging media and advertising that we use to get our clients noticed? Or is it our rock star list of national and international clients that include Wrangler, the Coca-Cola Company, NFL athletes, the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, Moe's Southwest Grill, ABB, the Justin Boot Company and countless others? Most likely… a combination of all the above.
